definition: a movable organ for flying (one of a pair), travel through the air
details:
noun
- a movable organ for flying (one of a pair)
- an addition that extends a main building
= synonyms: extension
- a barrier that surrounds the wheels of a vehicle to block splashing water or mud
= example: a barrier that surrounds the wheels of a vehicle to block splashing water or mud
= synonyms: fender
- one of the horizontal airfoils on either side of the fuselage of an airplane
- a stage area out of sight of the audience
= synonyms: offstage, backstage
- the wing of a fowl
= example: the wing of a fowl
- a unit of military aircraft
- the side of military or naval formation
= synonyms: flank
- a group within a political party or legislature or other organization that holds distinct views or has a particular function
= example: a group within a political party or legislature or other organization that holds distinct views or has a particular function
- (in flight formation) a position to the side and just to the rear of another aircraft
- a hockey player stationed in a forward position on either side
verb
- travel through the air
= synonyms: fly, propagate
